Name: Croc's World Construction Kit
About the game: Play and create custom levels of Croc's World! You can publish them on the internet and other players can play them as well! Crocs World Construction Kit features 4 different Settings and numerous tiles that can be used to create your own levels! Share them if you like via internet and let other people play your levels!
